title: Store/Featured Games Broken
body:
Hi, I've been playing this game for a while now and I've never had any problems with the store or featured games before, but I moved house recently and had to change internet which cause the store to show a black screen and the feature games on the homepage to show nothing. I've tried all the fixes in Internet Explorer but none of them work, I don't know if anybody can help me, considering its an internet problem, but I thought I might as well post anyways. If anyone can help that would be great.
Thanks. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hey Dalek,

>Exterminateeee! 

Can you try configuring your DNS using the guide linked below? 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5
